clean_data: Senior IT Project Manager Senior span lITspan span lProjectspan span lManagerspan San Bruno CA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Senior IT Project Manager Pacific Gas and Electric Company PGE San Francisco CA September 2014 to Present Successfully managed software and hardware projects and complex programs for PGEs Customer Care Technology Business Unit Projects include application software deployment for PGE Customer Care and Billing System and application and hardware deployment for PGEs Automated Metering Infrastructure Managed CPUCmandated Energy Efficiency Financial Programs which included multiple internal IT and Business organizations ThirdParty IT teams and ThirdParty CPUC assigned oversight party Effectively managed project budgets schedules risk identification and mitigation and issue management system Worked with PGE sourcing organization as well as with IT hardware and software vendors to manage project contracts invoices and budget Managed internal and external IT audit remediation projects Developed and maintained successful working relationships and partnerships with internal PGE organizations external project consultants ie KPMG PWC Accenture and IT hardware and software vendors Facilitated product and user acceptance training with IT hardware and software vendors and PGE endusers operational support staff and network administration staff Facilitates all weekly project reviews monthly steering committee meetings and biweekly budget reviews with key project stakeholders IT Compliance Analyst Pacific Gas and Electric Company PGE San Francisco CA March 2013 to September 2014 Introduced and implemented project management principles and methodologies for internal and external IT compliance projects The introduction of these principles and methodologies increased the efficiency of completing all the major project milestones on time by lessening the uncertainty of the project cycle and creating an environment of project clarity and understanding with all key stakeholders This includes creating a master project schedule using MS Project implementing risk issue and action item management establishing recurring coreteam meetings and establishing a weekly forecast view of upcoming milestones submilestones and tasks for distribution to the project stakeholders and sponsors Coordinated and facilitated stakeholder training sessions for the rollout of new or modified processes and procedures as required by NERC and enforced by WECC Collected evidence and artifacts and created and submitted major milestone closeout statements completion statements that describe the milestone and the work that was performed by the stakeholders Education Certificate Stanford August 2016 to June 2017 PMP in Project Management Mastery PGE Academy 2013 Project Management UC Santa Cruz Extension March 2003 to June 2005 Certificate in UNIX San Francisco State Extension September 1999 to March
